website_summaries.verdict: Nicely sized to hold your shower essentials, this handy caddy won't crowd your space.
pros: Top basket is deep enough for shampoo bottles or cleansers
Handy hooks for loofahs, washcloths, or razors
cons: Too small for a large collection of products

customer_reviews.title: Buy the white one.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the white plastic caddy in the hopes that I wouldn't have to deal with rust. Two years later, it is still in great condition. I can see the slightest hint of rust in the corners where the pieces join, but it is barely noticeable and the unit is still in awesome condition.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stick to shower, suction cups are flat.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but if the product doesn't work because it comes with brand new defective parts then the product becomes useless. Suction cups that are suppose to hold the unit to shower tiles are completely flat like paper and don't work at all. Its like getting a Mercedes with two wheels that don't roll, car looks beautiful but you cant drive it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Durable & sturdy...bought the bronze one because it's cheaper!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bronze one because it was cheaper than the other colors. It was going to be hidden away in my shower anyway, I didn't care if it matched my bathroom or not. It's durable and sturdy, it meet's my needs without issue. It has 2 small suction cups that secure it to the bathtub wall.
customer_reviews.author: StarShop Trooper

customer_reviews.title: Costly Solution - Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Our guest shower is rather small with little space for accessories. This shower caddy solved that problem with room to spare. We are not that fussy as to finish so we just bought the lowest price color - maybe bronze? 1st: Clean the area that the plastic stabilizing cups are to attach with a cotton ball soaked with isopropyl alcohol - let dry. This will insure a snug fit. We were confused as to what the clear plastic horseshoe shaped collar was for. Fortunately, another reviewer posted photos showing that the collar is used to prevent the caddy from sliding forward on the shower feed pipe.
customer_reviews.author: Physics Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want cubbies cut in the wall so decided on adding this caddy to our new bathroom. Better than I even hoped! I like the rubber at the hanger that protects my shower from scratches. It holds my large round bottle of Wen, my large round bottle of Purity and still has room for a large oval bottle of shower gel. That's the top shelf. The bottom shelf holds my shave soap, and Clarsonic. My bath buff hangs from one hook and my wet comb from another, my razor has a place of its own. It looks very sharp. Love the color and style.
customer_reviews.author: STAR STRUCKTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Shower Caddy
customer_reviews.text: We only use a few items in our shower caddy and this appliance seems to be doing the job nicely. I like the two suction cups that keeps the thing in place and the large and small hooks are a good feature. It will take time to truly evaluate this appliance. My experience with these things is that they rust under the brutal conditions of shower dampness. The manufacturer has claimed resistance to rust. If you want a better comment ask me again in six months at least.
customer_reviews.author: fish0143

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had known that this caddy fails to stay sitting on top of your shower faucet. Falls constantly and the suctions don't work. Returned. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Suction cups SUCK!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this purchase. The suction cups are so thin and flimsy and do not even have a concave shape. They are not sticking to a thing! Just for show! That makes this caddy unusable - I can't risk filling it with heavy bottles of shampoo and conditioner and have it fall on my daughter's head! I will have to be on the look out for good suction cups now to see if I can replace them and get some use out of this caddy, so instead of Amazon being a time saver, in this case it was a time sink!
customer_reviews.author: HisGrace

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this shower holder for less than two months & it’s completely disgusting. So much rust and looks like mold. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Dooms

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a caddy that looked nice, but also did a better job of staying ...
customer_reviews.text: Reason for purchase: Our previous shower caddy broke. I was looking for a caddy that looked nice, but also did a better job of staying in place. Results: We've had this caddy for 2-3 months and it has really gotten the job done. It grips the shower head really well and has stayed perfectly in place. It has a pleasant ivory-white finish and has required minimal cleaning. Our previous shower caddy wasn't a wired build, which meant that soap scum built up quickly even after regular cleaning. Final Thoughts: This shower caddy is holding up very well and seems to be a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This is a very small shower caddy. Not at all how the photo makes it look.
customer_reviews.author: R. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but the packaging...
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about the caddy and the convenience of ordering exactly what I want. However, does Amazon really need to waste so much material on packaging? This thing came with 20 feet of packing paper and was in a box 24” x 16” x 8” inches. That’s over 3,000 cubic inches. The unit only takes up 1200 cubic inches of space and was floating in the center of all the packing material. It was beneath everything. I can’t even reuse this stuff, and it takes up my whole recycling bin.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD

customer_reviews.title: Not good for larger shower heads.
customer_reviews.text: This shower basket does help solve the dillema of organizing multiple bottles laying around. It does have good storage capacity for bottles and also has hooks for razor blades and wash cloths. It does come with one caveat which is the size of your shower head. It works great if you have a smaller shower head, but this will be frustrating if you have a large head. I had a shower head with side wand attachment and this worked wonderfully. That head broke and was replaced with a shower head that included the wand within the head, making for a larger shower head. It rendered the top part of this basket useless since it obstructed bottles from standing upright.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this
customer_reviews.text: I bought two - one for our home and one for our rental cabin. The one at the cabin is holding up well, probably because it doesn’t get daily use - more weekend daily use. The one at our home, however looks like crap already. 4-1/2 months of daily use by one person and this is what it looks like. I’m so disappointed because I really liked everything about it - color, design, size. but the rust part... :-(
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F

customer_reviews.title: Rusty!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had this for that long, and it’s already rusty! I can’t even keep a bar of soap on it because rust gets everywhere. I shouldn’t have to take a shower rack out of the shower every time it gets wet. I feel like I wasted my money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Pros & cons
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality product. Pros: sturdy, can't fall down, cute Cons: can't hold "jumbo size" bottles, too high for kids to reach
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: A definite improvement!
customer_reviews.text: Our old shower caddy thingy was so nasty - had to be at least 15 years old. It was rusty, had soap scale all over it - definitely served its purpose but was time to go. This new one really makes the shower look so much better. It's slightly smaller, but it helps to keep everything in its place and organized, and really has enough space for the two of use and the products we use. I'm very happy with it! Didn't use the suction cups...honestly, my husband put it up so I don't even know if there were suction cups.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Llama

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but short
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how nice this was when i opened the box. Really great quality. But, I don’t know if my shower head is unusually high up, or if this thing is really short. Unfortunately if short people use my shower they won’t be able to reach shampoo in the top compartment. Make sure you measure before buying. I might send it back.
customer_reviews.author: A. Klein

customer_reviews.title: IT WILL RUST!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it first. i bought this a year ago and it is now so rusty esp where the soap goes! Product description says: NO RUST: Steel caddy has rust resistant coating ...
customer_reviews.author: JVLIXN

customer_reviews.title: Its too small then expected
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Its too small then expected. You cannot even use 2nd rack. Thought of return it but seems time have pass to return this.
customer_reviews.author: Shaan

customer_reviews.title: Great, if you don't have a hose
customer_reviews.text: It's great. The extra support keeps it from slipping off. It was great in my old apartment. Unfortunately, my new place has a removable shower head with a hose on it and this is not really compatible with that type of setup. The hose can't sit right and you can't really access the baskets. But if you have a shower head without a hose, this is great!
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Great shower caddy!
customer_reviews.text: Can only say positive things about this shower caddy. Bought for my husband's shower and he loves it. It's a nice "medium" size. It's sturdy but not too heavy. Fit over his large shower head with no problem. Holds everything he uses and he especially likes the multiple hangers. The color is very nice. He had some problem getting the suction cups to stay on the tiled shower wall but we took a tip from other reviewers and used petroleum jelly, which worked. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for almost 6 months and it is holding up great. There is just a tiny bit of corrosion at one of the lower joints that you can barely see. It took seconds to install without having to remove the shower head and shower head on hose. I just fed the hose head through and worked it over the fixed head and put it in place and set the suction cups on standard shower tile wall and it hasn't budged since. I have the white coating and it is sturdy enough for a large shampoo bottle and everything else and hasn't rusted. Dollar for dollar it's a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: ilmod

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews about the suction cups AFTER I had already ordered it, I was reluctant to even receive it. I am pleasantly surprised! This is a very sturdy shower caddy with different compartments for all of our needs. At first, I thought, too, that the suction cups were not sticking and started looking for replacements. However, after making sure that they had enough "liquid" on them when adhering to the tile wall, they are solid! I failed to look that it did not have an area to tip an almost empty bottle. It works by just angling the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Judyque

customer_reviews.title: Base Scratches Tile
customer_reviews.text: I have made the design work. The metal base rested against the tile. Initially I didn't think about it but over the course of the 1st 7 weeks, I noticed a slight scratching on the tile. To fix it I purchased 3/4" plastic tubing, cut it to length. Cut a straight line down the center of on side of the tubing, and fitted it around where the base was scratching the wall. The way my unit was manufactured, I could not use the suction cups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Cute and the perfect size! I bought the smaller one and it holds everything one person uses. It's a lot cuter in person than in the pic, like a shabby chic or cottage chic look.
customer_reviews.author: Calig McDevitt

customer_reviews.title: Simply Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish shower caddy. The dark bronze makes it look very elegant in our guest bathroom. The materials are very durable and it seems like it will last for a very long time. One less star due to the suction cups. They do not work when pressed down, even when a bit of water is added to them. The suction cups work to ensuring the shower tile does not get scratched by the caddy, but in terms of extra assurance that the caddy doesn't fall forward, not at all. Otherwise, very happy with look, quality, and very competitive price. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: 4SweetTs

customer_reviews.title: Like the color and how much it holds.
customer_reviews.text: Between my daughter and I we have creams, bottles and razors everywhere. You couldn’t move in the shower without knocking something over. This one stores everything. Four shampoo/conditioner/body wash bottles fit the top shelf. The second one holds tubes of face mask/face scrubs and you can hang your razors, scrunchies/wash clothes with the bottom hooks. Both suctions can’t be used at the same time but the rubber around the neck keeps it from crashing down on your head. I would recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Practical, but not without issues!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is not Rose Gold- it is true Copper color like a penny. If you need it to match other rose gold accessories I would suggest finding something else. Overall the organizer is very sturdy and practical! I do wish the top part (from hanger to first shelf) came down lower. It’s very difficult to get things in and out of that shelf because it goes behind the shower head... even more of a problem if you’re short. The suction cups don’t stick to tile, but that part isn’t a problem for me because the shelf is heavy and mostly stays put anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Panda4

customer_reviews.title: Man's perspective 10/10
customer_reviews.text: Had for longer than 4months now and suction holds up, no mold, and still black with no chipping. If you read comments amd view any of the negative ratings, its either they received an old brand or something different. I held off reviewing to make sure i didn't get persuaded into going either way. This is a good buy and its a beautiful addition to my boring tub.
customer_reviews.author: don m.

customer_reviews.title: Suction cup quick solution
customer_reviews.text: Here’s a tip for getting the suction cups to stick: Make sure the suction cups are dry and the shower wall also is dry. Then, take some liquid body wash and just generously goop it all over the suction side of both cups. Press the cups hard onto the dry shower wall. They should stick well. Granted, the suction cups are pretty lousy, and you will probably have to do this again in a while, but it worked for me as a quick fix. Otherwise, this shower caddy looks nice and works well for the price.
customer_reviews.author: PenaltyShot

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and roomy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is heavy duty, I like the non slip support in the top and the suction cups toward bottom to keep it in place against the wall. The only thing I dont like is that while the top rack is big and roomy for shampoos or soap bottles, i wish the 2nd rack (for bars of soap) was bigger (deeper) because I would prefer being able to put other bottles on it versus bars of soap. The razor hooks are a great feature as well and the loofah hooks. Overall it's really a great shower caddy.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Save your $$ this is cheap
customer_reviews.text: If I could give less than one star I would. Nothing about this cheaply made shower organizer works. It’s to small for large bottles. It’s not sturdy. It hangs crooked, and the suction cups are weak. It’s already been thrown in to the garbage. Replaced by a nice one that I found at Home Store.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Lamm

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of buying something like this online, especially with my experiences in the past with flimsy wire and/or tube organizational tools. But, this guy is SOLID. I have it hanging from my shower head, suction cupped to the wall, and it feels like I can hang off of it. I keep one of those big salon sized pump shampoo bottles on it (seriously, it's like almost 2 liters of heavy goo) and it doesn't fuss at all. Worth the money, is strong, and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: C. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Cute, decent caddy
customer_reviews.text: This caddy is really cute and it’s functionally good, so I say it’s worth 4 stars easily. I do wish it was a little more tall, because the lower of the two shelves is hard to fit anything in (height-wise). The upper shelf is perfect, and the hooks are useful. I personally had little to no issue with the suction cups, because we have completely flat shower walls. But, suction cups in general just tend to suck (no pun intended), so if it didn’t work I wouldn’t be shocked.
customer_reviews.author: Eric & Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Used to organize baby gear
customer_reviews.text: Our kitchen has limited counter space and I needed a way to store all of my daughter's bottles, bibs, sippy cups, etc. without clogging up our counter. I also wanted something that would be reasonably priced and be temporary. So I mounted this shower caddy with command hooks to the side of one of our cabinets and it works perfectly! There's plenty of room for her bibs to hang on the hooks and her bottles, sippy cups, and food pouches fit in the top shelf. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Usernamesarefun

customer_reviews.title: Useless suction cups!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot give this product more than 3 stars for only two reasons. 1. The suction cups are completely useless. They are the cheap non concave type which don't stick at all. I solved this by using some double sided heavy duty tape. 2. I felt the entire thing should have hung down a little lower. Otherwise the finish is really nice and it does work as advertised. I will edit this review down the line if I see rust forming. This is an honest and genuine review for which I DID NOT receive any free products or discounts.
customer_reviews.author: Suvi Viswanathan

customer_reviews.title: very nice but not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: this product was in my shower for about 2-3 days before it began to tarnish
customer_reviews.author: Erika Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great Design and Size!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of this shower caddy. It's simple, offers plenty of space for our needs and the price was very reasonable. When I've purchased shower caddy's in the past, before using, I remove the suction cups and give it a couple of thin coats of clear anti-rust type spray paint (such as Rustoleum CLEAR Automotive). When the paint is dry, put the suction cups back on and hang. Reapplying the clear coat from time to time will make it last longer and definitely resist rust - at least that's been my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Great shower caddy, but not with my showerhead.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shower caddy, well made and sturdy. When I opened the box, I thought the suction cups seemed flimsy, but they grabbed right onto my shower tile like cling film and stabilized the caddy nicely. The caddy has plenty of storage space, too. It didn't work for me, though, because my showerhead has a handheld attachment and it wouldn't fit in its holder with the caddy in place. Too bad, because I really liked it otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Joy2U

customer_reviews.title: My fault for not looking at the dimensions but this ...
customer_reviews.text: My fault for not looking at the dimensions but this is really small. The bottom rack isn't tall enough to hold anything except a bar of soap. The top rack isn't wide enough to hold more than 3 bottles so if you have a lot of products I'd choose something different.
customer_reviews.author: amazonshopper19384

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Perfect size to hold products securely. Suction cups prevent movement. For my guest bathroom. Big enough to hold three full size products, with room for more. Family doesn't need to bring shampoo, conditioner, or body wash. Not sure my son would ever bring his own. Why when Mom's shower has a wide assortment of luxury products? Of course I want him to have the best. Yes, the large walk-in shower with the fancy shower heads is cool. Sure, go ahead. At least the other shower stays clean.
customer_reviews.author: uncommon_boston

customer_reviews.title: It's nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like this. I accidentally ordered this one without remembering there is a metal bar underneath the shower head. I thought I would have to return it but it still fits, just hangs on to the bar vs the shower head. I don't even need the suction cups so that's why I didn't rate them. The top basket holds quite a bit but the second one is a little small for much more than soap or sample size things. Also, I like its look. The brown metal is rustic looking.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I don't just like this shower caddy, I love it. I must have looked at 50 different ones before ordering this one and hoping for the best. Well, it's exactly what I was hoping for. Not too big, not too small, just right for my needs. Everything that needed to fit in there fits. The suction cups haven't suctioned but that doesn't seem to be an issue and I haven't spent a lot of time trying to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its very small
customer_reviews.text: Please do not purchase. This item is a joke. The first tier holds 2 small size bottles and the second holds maybe 2 soap bars which I don't use. I couldn't imagine what type of shower would require such a tiny storage item.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Had one too many cases of my shaving cream container ...
customer_reviews.text: Had one too many cases of my shaving cream container falling on my feet and my shower caddy slipping on the pipe which prompted me to purchase this Shower Caddy. Problems solved, No Slipping and Shaving Cream, Shampoo etc. does not fall out because the top basket is sufficiently deep to prevent this happening and the Caddy comes with a plastic friction collar which really works and prevents any sliding down or moving, Ordered the white finish and appears top notch, attractive and I was very impressed with the quality. You will have no regrets purchasing this product
customer_reviews.author: Alexo

customer_reviews.title: More Beautiful In Person
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised that this is even more beautiful in person than in the pictures. The only thing that could be improved is the suction cups which I was concerned wouldn't hold because they came bent out of shape. So far the suction cups have held nicely. There is a plastic piece under the neck which makes this sit quite nicely on the shower pipe.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rainbolt

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: You put it over your shower head, then smoosh the suction cups against your shower wall. Then it just sort of sticks there. You put stuff in it that you use when you shower. It's not huge, so you if you have a ton of products you might want something bigger. You might have problems with the suction cups if your shower is tiled, I guess, but mine has a smooth wall. And even without suction cups, it will hang there.
customer_reviews.author: Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Hasn’t had any issue with rust & very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this 3 months ago and haven’t had any issue in regards to rusting. It is sturdy and holds well. Hasn’t slipped once off our shower head but the suction doesn’t really do it’s job. We’re able to store about 5-6 bottles on the top shelf and haven’t really used too much on the 2nd shelf. I like that there’s a space for both his&hers razer and 2 hooks for you to hang your loofa.
customer_reviews.author: Kimster

customer_reviews.title: Good caddy!
customer_reviews.text: The bottom two suction cups don’t stick to my shower at all. It doesn’t matter because it stays put due to the clip at the top... but if the bottom 2 suction cups are important to you... they won’t work. Other than that... it does it’s job & it can hold some smaller sized things (loofah, 2 razors, small shampoo bottles, etc....) perfect for tidying up the shower if you use a lot of products!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ness

customer_reviews.title: If you need storage... pass on this one!
customer_reviews.text: Was really looking forward to this item since we moved we no longer have the bathroom storage we need for shampoos and body washes...i am very disappointed!!! Shelves way smaller then I thought. Doesnt store many items. Can only use the top shelf because the second one is way to small to hold anything unless you lay it flat. Waste of money, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: Answered the Call for what we needed
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this purchase if it's what you're looking for! We've owned this product for 3 weeks now and the description is very accurate. Our issue was that a short showerhead pipe was causing the water to hit the top shelf of our previous caddy, this one has a lower top shelf profile meaning the annoying misting of shower pressure has now subsided--we get the full effect of our steady-stream shower head! Additionally, the coating and chosen color of the caddy is very sufficient and consistent with the Amazon description.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Not that good
customer_reviews.text: The space is OK unless your better half starts packing more than 3 bottles. But I really don't like the soap storage on the second basket. It's hard to fit my hand and grab soap from there. I'm going to replace my caddy with something bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Art S

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of items
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new shower caddy because my other one was getting rusty. I was very happy to find that this had an anti-rusting type of material or counting on it, seems to be holding up fabulous and the darker color Metal looks great in the shower. I also love that this has little hooks for your disposable razors to hang in the shower I thought that was a very awesome idea.
customer_reviews.author: tiedyedflower

customer_reviews.title: Back bar to prevents items from falling behind
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why the back bar is so unusual to find, but I realized when I had another caddy that it was necessary, so I looked for one that wouldn't let my shampoo fall through the back if the caddy moved. This one works great, is easy to put up, and I have no complaints. Would probably make a great home warming gift because houses don't usually come with one.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: This works over the shower head with a wall which is not even in all places!
customer_reviews.text: I am in an older home and the shower is from l985 and the wall is not even. It just was not made that way. I did try two other holders for all that I wanted in the shower, but they did not work. This one which goes over the shower head filled the bill and I was delighted. It comes in various finishes so pick one which matches your shower head.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: 3 years later
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for three years, and I haven't experienced any rusting. Also, I will say I am disappointed that the most hilarious photo review of this product is no longer here. It was the reason why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Suction doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, had good weight, and can store a lot, but as the title mentions the suction is just poor. Wont even stick to the wall. Tried first when wall was dry, then with little bits of water, cleaning etc. If its possible to get the suction changed then maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Engler

customer_reviews.title: The bottom shelf can only hold very small items
customer_reviews.text: I got this because the reviews and price were good but I wish I would have shopped around me beforehand. It functions well, however the bottom shelf doesn't have enough of a clearing between the top shelf to hold anything taller than about an inch and a half. I have some travel-sized bottles and not even those fit. The top shelf can store a fair amount of products, so that's nice. If you have large bottles (like Très Emme shampoo for example) don't get this because they won't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: little details make this GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace what I thought was a good shower caddy that slipped forward easily when you put any more than 3 items in the top section. This one though has nice high sides on top AND a clear plastic/rubber bit that grips the shower pipe AND two suction cups lower down to keep the whole thing in place. The razor holder at the bottom is nice and the pearlescent effect is a neat little extra.
customer_reviews.author: InstantKarmma

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and pretty, too
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower caddy! The color is perfect (I have the bronze), it’s elegant with its slightly curved lines/shape, and it holds what I need it to hold (two big, heavy shampoo and condiciones bottles, my face wash and a large body wash, plus room in the little shelf and hangers below for razor, bath sponges, etc). So glad I bought it. The plastic piece that goes between the shower head and the caddy does a great job of keeping it stable. It never falls forward or off like some do. It always stays stable and upright.
customer_reviews.author: booklover

customer_reviews.title: Fairly good
customer_reviews.text: This product gets the job done and my newly organized shower makes me so happy. It holds 5-6 of my bottles, and has a separate shelf for soap/other smaller items, and a few hooks for your razors. I removed one star because the one I received seemed used -- there was mold on the suction cups. It seemed fine otherwise so I kept it. P.S. the suction cups do not work.
customer_reviews.author: Heather G.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for us! Holds allot for a low profile rack.
customer_reviews.text: For the price? I was really impressed. Not too big or small and the 2 bottom suctions keep rack steady and centered if your bottles are not balanced. Hooks aren’t too big or small. Hold razor steady and facing away from water stream. Coating is solid and shouldn’t see rust anytime soon. Really happy with the find.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Very Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Was going to send this item back as the seller doesn't say it weights a ton and is way to heavy to put on your shower arm. We ended up keeping it as Amazon or the seller want's to charge more than what the item is worth in shipping to send back. Go to Wal-Mart and buy one that you can see before you make the purchase, you'll be farther ahead
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, even a year later!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a year ago and they still work great! They're on the smaller side so the top rack only fits 3 large bottles but it still works for me. It fits my shampoo and conditioner and my husband's 3 in 1 bottle. The bottom rack holds face wash and shaving cream, the hooks hold our loufas, razor, and a hair brush I use in shower. Like I said, it works for me!
customer_reviews.author: RON ALLIE

customer_reviews.title: Rust all over!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product at first, the color and size were great! But it didn’t last long at all! Now is supper rusty! I tried to get the rust out, but realized that the paint had cracks all over, so it’s going to the trash now...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works so far
customer_reviews.text: This is the third shower caddy I've ordered so hopefully this will be the charm. It hasn't fallen down and hold enough stuff for myself. the little suction cups to keep it from moving side to side let loose once in a while. The one I ordered was white there seems to be some paint missing on the front which I hope doesn't lead to rust.
customer_reviews.author: Annoynomus

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: This is not your typical junk make out of standard metal rods, this is put together nice and has style. The suction cups are weak but I did eventually get them to hold well. You need to really clean the wall and rub your thumbs over the suction cups for a while to get a little oil from your fingers on it.
customer_reviews.author: PanzerPink

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: This shower caddy makes my bath/shower look so much nicer now. Gives a little pizazz. I got the pearl color, and I really like it, it has subtle shimmers. The suctions don’t do much, but it’s very secure around the neck of the shower head. Also I wish the caddy was longer and a little wider but it’s pretty good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Pupchild

customer_reviews.title: Caddy carring everything.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to replace a rusty old caddy that kept slipping and making noise when hitting the shower head. I really like the rubber/silicone that helps to prevent slipping down the neck. The suction cups however are not much to talk about. They barely reach the wall and provide little or no suction at all. Overall, I really like this product and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product. It fits in my tub area perfectly. The only suggestion that I might have on this, The bottom shelf, which i use for bar soap could be spaced just a little bit more from the upper shelf. Overall I am very pleased
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small shower!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a small house and small bathroom. Was looking for something that could hold our (two of us) shampoos/conditioners, razor, soap. This fits the bill. It is sturdy and hangs straight down (we have purchased two previously that warped within 6 month or less). We're happy .
customer_reviews.author: HHZ

customer_reviews.title: Garbage, don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Rusting after less than 2 years. This is the 2nd one the first rusted after 6 months. Will be looking for a stainless steel one elsewhere. Hello, it is used in a wet environment! Using cheap steel with a thin coat of paint does not cut it in this application!!
customer_reviews.author: G Man

customer_reviews.title: Nice caddy
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with it, it does the job and it was not very expensive. It is very sturdy and it has a little plastic on the hanging part of it that doesn't allow it to slide down, which we really like. I would buy it again and we had a very good experience with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Wads

customer_reviews.title: No go.
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes, but a no go. Got the white hoping it wouldn’t rust, but three months after getting it we’re replacing it. We live in a dry climate so if you live in a humid area, it’ll likely rust even faster. Also, the space between the soap dish and the top rack is too small and makes reaching in for the soap awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Lee R. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Highly rated by Amazon and I agree.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product for the money. Easy slip on over the shower head and has a piece of plastic to help it stay in place. My GF loves the place for the razor. She hangs her wash sponge on the hooks provided. This device has everything you need for shower supplies, and well placed hooks and shelves. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: RUST!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect size for our small stand up shower but within 2 months it is rusting. I've had many metal shower caddies that I've kept for many years without rusting. It only has 2 jobs: hold bath products & don't rust and it majorly fails the second. Super disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Thibeault

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: I waited too long to return this item. I feel like I was ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Montekat

customer_reviews.title: It could have been great...but
customer_reviews.text: Suction didn't work. Ended up gluing the suction cups to the tile. Weight of a couple of shampoo bottles is enough to pull it off the shower head tube. had to spot glue that as well. Really wanted to give this 5 stars, but it's been a pain to make it functional.
customer_reviews.author: Fred C RN

customer_reviews.title: Nice but...
customer_reviews.text: One of the pieces at the bottom of the organizer, which you would use to hang a loofah, was bent at an awkward angle when I received it. And I can’t really get it bent back into place. I’m still using it, but it’s a little disappointing because otherwise this organizer is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Best shower caddy out there
customer_reviews.text: I went through so many shower caddies before finding this one - some more expensive than others and this one is amazing. It is the only one that stays suctioned to my marble shower and holds literally everything comfortably. The shampoo bottles fit comfortably, as do the soap and razors. This caddy is also a great length and doesn't stick out too much. I've only had it for a little while so can't speak to the rust, but I got the white like someone recommended in the comments and no rust yet. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RDW

customer_reviews.title: Great storage
customer_reviews.text: We have a smaller stand up shower with only one small corner shelf that would only hold a small shampoo bottle and a bar of soap so I would have to keep all of my products under the sink and bring them in the shower with me which was so frustrating bc I would always forget to grab something! Now I can fit my bottle soap, 3 regular size shampoo bottles on the top shelf, face wash and bar of soap on the small middle shelf and hang my razor and wash rag on the bottom hooks! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Hollie B

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: The finish is very nice. The design allows razors to be hung in the top basket as well as the lower spots. The hooks are perfect for anything with a loop or a scrub brush with a handle. There is plenty of room for several shampoo bottles. The lower shelf is great for soap.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: Great caddy, on the small side
customer_reviews.text: Works great! It’s slightly smaller than I expected, I even measured but it just seems small. Big bottles won’t fit but normal size bottles fit great. It holds a few of my husbands things, so it’s certainly not meant to fit a ton of stuff. Overall, very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie_Kristina

customer_reviews.title: best shower caddy ever
customer_reviews.text: This shower caddy is not only attractive, holds a lot of various sized shower necessities, hangs nicely, and feels sturdy, but 11 months after purchasing there's NO evidence of rust anywhere on the caddy. This is the first shower caddy I ever had that did not show rust.
customer_reviews.author: tough customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $17
customer_reviews.text: The suction cups came warped and it would not stick to my shower. They also cannot be removed to be replaced as I did think of this trying to not have to return. The bottom shelf is too small to fit anything but a bar of soap. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Erin S Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Looks high end
customer_reviews.text: has a nice rubber protector to not scratch shower head, but this allows it to not sit flush, when then alters the two suction cups. This isn't a real issue bc it such a well made intuit that it sits fine, doesn't tilt, is heavy enough doesn't move on its own. Very sleek looking. Love it. Matches my brushed Nicole shower head well.
customer_reviews.author: sarah ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Ok product with no suction power of suction cups.
customer_reviews.text: It does the work, stores my one body wash, one shampoo and one conditioner one the same level of rack. I haven’t used the bottom rack, the shorter one. The suction cups are for decoration I guess. They came with flat surface. I didn’t even need to try them I knew they were useless. Just like most reviews mentioned. I wish the company could send me a pair of new/functional suction cups.
customer_reviews.author: Chih-Yun Tao

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a singles shower.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why some people had bad luck with these, but mine is pretty much perfect. It stuck straight to the shower wall when I put it up and hasn't moved a bit. The only caveat is the second shelf. Unless you're putting a razor or bar soap in there, it won't be of much use. I can fit far large bottles on the top shelf, so I can't complain. Pretty sturdy product for the price. 9/10
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again. Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like it a lot. It looks classy and has lots of options to hang stuff. If one of the shelves was a bit wider it could fit a soap dish sitting flat and I would like the suction cups to be movable to adjust to avoid tile joints. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great product, not for handheld shower head
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and design of this shower caddy. It fits great over a regular shower head and I like that it has suction cups to help stay in place. Unfortunately we have a handheld shower heads in the house which do not fit through the front of this caddy well. I will use it in the guest bathroom for now with the hose tucked off to the side. For the price it was still a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.  Suction cups cannot be adjusted to fit your tile.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is nice. It is a solid color not shiny. It would be perfect except you cannot adjust the width of the suction cups easily. It will move up or down about .5" Suction cups are 2" in diameter. The gap placement of the cups is 6.5" to the center of the cups. The placement was overlapping my tile and would not stick. I took the cups out and put them on the other side of the bar to hold the caddy in place.
customer_reviews.author: eph

customer_reviews.title: Good  Quality  Product
customer_reviews.text: Yeah the suctions cups don't work though. But didn't care about them anyway the one I had before was in desperate need of being replaced . I have more room on this one to put body washes and what not and its more stable. So happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when first ordering this as we don't have a shower head to put it over. Our caregiver attached it to the wall midway between the water and the seat of our walk-in tub. It's perfect! It has just enough room for everything we want and the different sizes makes it very convenient. This really helps the situation in the bathroom as we have minimum storage and it's difficult for us to get things into the tub as needed. Now everything is where we want it and it's very conveniently located.
customer_reviews.author: Fairelady

customer_reviews.title: The caddy is great quality, but it doesn't really work for shower ...
customer_reviews.text: The caddy is great quality, but it doesn't really work for shower heads that have a hose on them. The way it's built, the hose gets all caught up in the caddy and then the shower head gets turned sideways, which is kind of annoying to fix every time you have to shower. Plus, the suction cups don't actually stick to the wall. But the quality is good and it holds all of our stuff, so that's nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Grove

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, lesser capacity than I thought
customer_reviews.text: The matte black looks GREAT against my black tiles, and it is very well made and sturdy. It clipped on to the shower head and sticks on to my tile with no problem at all. The top compartment holds four of my products well. The only downside is there is maybe a 2-3 inch space between the top and bottom compartments, so you wouldn't be able to store anything but a bar of soap or maybe a bottle if you lay it flat on the bottom shelf. Otherwise, this is the best metal caddy ever!
customer_reviews.author: Merari

customer_reviews.title: Waited so long
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why we waited so long to purchase something like this. I bought two and they look great in the shower areas. I've only had them about 2-3 months so can't say anything about long term quality but right now they are sturdy and do the job.
customer_reviews.author: MadATL

customer_reviews.title: Durable and looks great
customer_reviews.text: This shower caddy seems very durable. I'm able to put 2 large Costco shampoo bottles and 1 smaller bottle in the top. The lower shelf holds bars of soap, razors, and other small items. Unlike other people, I had no trouble getting the suction cups to hold. It looks great in my shower. I love the bronze color, too.
customer_reviews.author: M. More

customer_reviews.title: Good just small
customer_reviews.text: This is nice, it’s just smaller than I was expecting. I guess I should have paid more attention to the sizing before ordering but it’s the smallest one I’ve ever had. The price was good though so I can’t complain. I really like that it has hooks to hang washcloths and my sons rinsing cup. Overall it seems to be of good quality and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: AJM

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This is the least functional shower caddy ever. I should have read the dimensions more closely, but the bottom shelf is useless. It's too big for a bar of soap, with no section or partition for it, but NOTHING else can fit there. I can't even fit travel sized bottles or samples. I guess you could fit toothpaste on its side? What is the point of this shelf???
customer_reviews.author: C. Brozek

product_meta.title: iDesign York Metal Wire Hanging Shower Caddy, Extra Wide Space for Shampoo, Conditioner, and Soap with Hooks for Razors, Towels, and More, 10" x 4" x 22", Silver
product_meta.description:
Color:SilverOrganize your shower with the iDesign York Shower Caddy! This large hanging caddy is placed over any shower head for additional storage. The rust-resistant silver finish adds a classic look and will stay looking new for years of quality use. Designed with lower hooks, you can easily hold multiple razors, loofahs, and washcloths, allowing them to dry off between showers. The metal wire racks allow for water drainage while storing your shampoos, soap, and other bath items. Measuring 10" x 4" x 22", you are sure to have space for all of your bath time necessities in the iDesign York Shower Caddy. With iDesign by InterDesign, you can #livesimply every day.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This York Lyra Shower Caddy bring classic American style to your shower space. Its 2 shelves can accommodate larger bottles and have hooks for towels, loofahs and brushes.
feature_bullets: STYLISH SHOWER CADDY: Two metal wire racks allow for water drainage while storing your shampoo, conditioner, soap, and creams. Lower hooks hold razor, washcloth, loofah, sponge, and more. Great for master bathroom, kid's bathroom, and guest bathroom
RUST-RESISTANT FINISH: Stylish silver finish matches any decor and stays looking new for years to come
INTEGRATED HOOKS: Bottom hooks are ideal for drying your bathroom essentials between showers
EXTRA WIDE: Wide design allows you to store all of your bath essentials in one place
FITS MOST SHOWER HEADS: Large upper space between racks allows for easy mounting. Measures 10" x 4" x 22"

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars6,952 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
